summary: Adopt governance collateral across the field repository

directives.details: Introduce MIT LICENSE at the repository root mirroring high_command_ai_0 issuance (copyright 2025 Contingencyplana).
Publish CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md aligned with SHAGI doctrine; reuse the language provided in high_command_ai_0 unless field-specific adjustments are required.
Add CONTRIBUTING.md detailing setup, validation, and reporting expectations for toysoldiers_ai_0. Reference forge tooling and exchange schema adherence.
Relay a brief acknowledgement via exchange acknowledging adoption and flagging any deviations or pending tasks.
